hero.title: Transform Your Yard with Campos Landscaping Maintenance LLC
hero.subtitle: Expert lawn care, landscaping, and maintenance services for a beautiful and healthy outdoor space.

features.title: Lawn Care & Maintenance
features.desc: Keep your lawn healthy and green with our expert mowing, fertilization, aeration, and weed control services.

features.title: Landscaping Design & Installation
features.desc: Create the outdoor oasis of your dreams with our custom landscape design and installation services.

features.title: Seasonal Clean-Up
features.desc: Prepare your property for the changing seasons with our spring and fall clean-up services, including leaf removal and debris removal.

features.title: Hardscaping Services
features.desc: Enhance your outdoor living space with patios, walkways, retaining walls, and more.

reviews.author: John S.
reviews.text: Campos Landscaping did an amazing job transforming my overgrown yard into a beautiful space. Highly recommend!

reviews.author: Maria G.
reviews.text: Reliable, professional, and reasonably priced. I'm so glad I chose Campos Landscaping for my lawn maintenance needs.

services.title: Mowing
services.desc: Professional mowing services to keep your lawn looking its best.

services.title: Fertilization
services.desc: Customized fertilization programs for a healthy and vibrant lawn.

services.title: Weed Control
services.desc: Effective weed control solutions to eliminate unwanted growth.

services.title: Mulching
services.desc: Enhance your landscape with quality mulch to retain moisture and suppress weeds.

testimonials.author: Jane Doe
testimonials.text: Campos Landscaping exceeded my expectations! My yard has never looked better.
